scripts.Build & Run - Production: clear && rm -r dist && tsc && npx webpack --env buildType=production --mode production && npm run Start-dist
scripts.Build & Run - Development: clear && npx webpack --env buildType=development --mode production && npm run Start-src-ts
scripts.Seed: clear && cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.Undo-Seed: clear && cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all
scripts.Refresh-Seed: clear && cd src && npm run Undo-Seed && npm run Seed
scripts.Migrate: clear && cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.Undo-Migrate: clear && cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all
scripts.Clean-Slate: clear && npm run Undo-Migrate && npm run Migrate
scripts.Clean Slate with Data: clear && npm run Clean-Slate && npm run Seed

scripts-backup.clean & build: clear && npm run clean && npm run build
scripts-backup.clean & watch: clear && npm run clean && tsc && webpack --watch --mode production
scripts-backup.clean & build - production: clear && npm run clean && tsc && webpack --mode production
scripts-backup.webpack clean & build - production: clear && npm run clean && webpack --mode production
